# clean_up_matching_religious_communities_effect

silk_road_religion_spread_effect = {
	clr_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
	clr_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
	clr_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_sea
	
	any_trade_route_province = {
		limit = {
			trade_route = silk_road
		}
		
		clr_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
	}
	
	event_target:pulse_province = {
		set_variable = {
			which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
			value = 0
		}
	}
	
	#log = "Attempting Silk Road religion spread!"
	
	#log = "[starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province.GetName] is the starting province"
	
	#log = "[starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province.Religion.GetName] is the religion"
	
	event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
		save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
	}
	
	silk_road_religion_spread_loop_effect = yes
}

silk_road_religion_spread_loop_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			event_target:pulse_province = {
				check_variable = {
					which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
					value < 10
				}
			}
			
			event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
				has_valid_silk_road_religion_spread_path_trigger = yes
			}
			
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
			}
		}
		
		event_target:pulse_province = {
			change_variable = {
				which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
				value = 1
			}
		}
		
		determine_next_silk_road_religion_spread_target_province_effect = yes
	}

	else_if = {
		limit = {
			event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
				NOT = {
					religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				}
			}
		}
		
		attempt_silk_road_religion_spread_effect = yes
	}
	
	#else = {
	#	log = "Silk Road religion spread failed"
	#}
	
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
			has_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_sea
		}
		
		random = {
			chance = 50
			set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
		}
	}
}

determine_next_silk_road_religion_spread_target_province_effect = {
	event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
		set_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
	}
	
	#log = "Attempting to move away from [current_silk_road_religion_spread_province.GetName]"
	
	random_list = {
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
					is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
					any_trade_route_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			determine_new_silk_road_path_1_province_effect = yes
		}
		
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
					is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
					any_trade_route_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
						is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			determine_new_silk_road_path_2_province_effect = yes
		}
		
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
					is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
					any_trade_route_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			determine_new_silk_road_path_3_province_effect = yes
		}
		
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
					is_silk_road_path_4_province_trigger = yes
					any_trade_route_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_4_province_trigger = yes
						is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			determine_new_silk_road_path_4_province_effect = yes
		}
		
		1 = {
			trigger = {
				event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
					is_silk_road_path_5_province_trigger = yes
					any_trade_route_province = {

		}
		
		1 = {

				event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {

		1 = {
			trigger = {

							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			determine_new_silk_road_path_126_province_effect = yes
		}

		}
	}
	
	silk_road_religion_spread_loop_effect = yes
}

attempt_silk_road_religion_spread_effect = {
	#log = "Final province selected: [current_silk_road_religion_spread_province.GetName]"
	
	#log = "Current religion: [current_silk_road_religion_spread_province.Religion.GetName]"
	
	random_list = {
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
					OR = {
						is_holy_site_with_matching_province_religion_trigger = no
						
						AND = {
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
							
							religion_authority < 0.3
							
							event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
								religion_authority >= 0.6
							}
						}
						
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = no
					}
					
					NOT = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					
					any_province_holding = {
						OR = {
							holding_type = castle
							holding_type = city
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
			}
			
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
			}
			
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				owner = {
					religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				}
			}
			
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
			}
			
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
			}
		
			# Religion spreads
			increase_silk_road_religion_presence_effect = yes
		}
	
		50 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value >= 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				owner = {
					religion = PREV
				}
			}
			
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				religion_authority >= 0.6
			}
			
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				is_hard_to_convert = yes
			}
			
			# Religion fails to spread
			#log = "Religion failed to spread"
		}
	}
}

increase_silk_road_religion_presence_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
		}
		
		add_appropriate_public_silk_road_religious_community_on_conversion_effect = yes
		
		religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
		
		remove_appropriate_public_silk_road_religious_community_on_conversion_effect = yes
		
		remove_appropriate_secret_religious_community_effect = yes
		
		#log = "Province converted"
		
		# Inform owner and liege(s)
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_trade_post
			}
			
			owner = {
				character_event = { id = tianxia.903 }
				
				any_liege = {
					limit = {
						ai = no
						NOT = {
							character = PREV
						}
					}
					
					character_event = { id = tianxia.903 }
				}
			}
		}
		
		else = {
			owner = {
				character_event = { id = tianxia.905 }
				
				any_liege = {
					limit = {
						ai = no
						NOT = {
							character = PREV
						}
					}
					
					character_event = { id = tianxia.905 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	else = {
		add_appropriate_public_silk_road_religious_community_effect = yes
		
		remove_appropriate_secret_religious_community_effect = yes
		
		#log = "Province got a public religious community"
		
		# Inform owner and liege(s)
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_trade_post
			}
			
			owner = {
				character_event = { id = tianxia.904 }
				
				any_liege = {
					limit = {
						ai = no
						NOT = {
							character = PREV
						}
					}
					
					character_event = { id = tianxia.904 }
				}
			}
		}
		
		else = {
			owner = {
				character_event = { id = tianxia.906 }
				
				any_liege = {
					limit = {
						ai = no
						NOT = {
							character = PREV
						}
					}
					
					character_event = { id = tianxia.906 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

add_appropriate_public_silk_road_religious_community_on_conversion_effect = {
	trigger_switch = {
		on_trigger = religion
		
		# Christian
		catholic = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_catholic_community years = 50 } } }
		cathar = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_cathar_community years = 50 } } }
		fraticelli = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_fraticelli_community years = 50 } } }
		lollard = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_lollard_community years = 50 } } }
		waldensian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_waldensian_community years = 50 } } }
		miaphysite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_miaphysite_community years = 50 } } }
		monophysite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_monophysite_community years = 50 } } }
		nestorian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_nestorian_community years = 50 } } }

		iconoclast = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_iconoclast_community years = 50 } } }
		monothelite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_monothelite_community years = 50 } } }

		# Mazdan
		zoroastrian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_zoroastrian_community years = 50 } } }

		manichaean = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_manichaean_community years = 50 } } }
		khurmazta = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_khurmazta_community years = 50 } } }
	}
}

remove_appropriate_public_silk_road_religious_community_on_conversion_effect = {
	event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = religion
			
			# Christian
			catholic = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_catholic_community } }
			cathar = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_cathar_community } }
			fraticelli = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_fraticelli_community } }
			lollard = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_lollard_community } }
			waldensian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_waldensian_community } }
			miaphysite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_miaphysite_community } }
			monophysite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_monophysite_community } }
			nestorian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_nestorian_community } }
			messalian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_messalian_community } }
			orthodox = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_orthodox_community } }
			bogomilist = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_bogomilist_community } }

add_appropriate_public_silk_road_religious_community_effect = {
	event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = religion
			
			# Christian
			catholic = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_catholic_community years = 50 } } }
			cathar = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_cathar_community years = 50 } } }
			fraticelli = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_fraticelli_community years = 50 } } }
			lollard = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_lollard_community years = 50 } } }
			waldensian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_waldensian_community years = 50 } } }
			miaphysite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_miaphysite_community years = 50 } } }
			monophysite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_monophysite_community years = 50 } } }
			nestorian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_nestorian_community years = 50 } } }
			messalian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_messalian_community years = 50 } } }
			orthodox = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_orthodox_community years = 50 } } }

			iconoclast = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_iconoclast_community years = 50 } } }
			monothelite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { add_province_modifier = { modifier = silk_road_monothelite_community years = 50 } } }

remove_appropriate_secret_religious_community_effect = {
	event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province = {
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = religion
			
			# Christian
			catholic = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_catholic_community } }
			cathar = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_cathar_community } }
			fraticelli = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_fraticelli_community } }

			monophysite = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_monophysite_community } }
			nestorian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_nestorian_community } }

			andamanese_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_andamanese_pagan_reformed_community } }
			bai_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_bai_pagan_reformed_community } }
			bamar_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_bamar_pagan_reformed_community } }
			batak_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_batak_pagan_reformed_community } }
			chinese_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_chinese_pagan_reformed_community } }
			dayak_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_dayak_pagan_reformed_community } }
			dusun_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_dusun_pagan_reformed_community } }
			inca_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_inca_pagan_reformed_community } }
			jurchen_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_jurchen_pagan_reformed_community } }
			korean_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_korean_pagan_reformed_community } }
			maian_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_maian_pagan_reformed_community } }
			melanesian_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_melanesian_pagan_reformed_community } }
			miao_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_miao_pagan_reformed_community } }
			minahasan_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_minahasan_pagan_reformed_community } }
			minangkabau_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_minangkabau_pagan_reformed_community } }
			nivkh_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_nivkh_pagan_reformed_community } }
			ryukyuan_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_ryukyuan_pagan_reformed_community } }
			sanamahi_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_sanamahi_pagan_reformed_community } }
			sundanese_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_sundanese_pagan_reformed_community } }
			tai_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_tai_pagan_reformed_community } }
			taiwanese_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_taiwanese_pagan_reformed_community } }
			viet_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_viet_pagan_reformed_community } }
			yi_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_yi_pagan_reformed_community } }
			zhuang_pagan_reformed = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_zhuang_pagan_reformed_community } }
			
			# Mazdan
			zoroastrian = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_zoroastrian_community } }
			mazdaki = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_mazdaki_community } }
			manichaean = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_manichaean_community } }
			khurmazta = { event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province = { remove_province_modifier = secret_khurmazta_community } }
		}
	}
}

	trigger_switch = {
		on_trigger = religion
		
		# Christian
		catholic = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_catholic_community }
		cathar = { remove_province_modifier = silk_road_cathar_community }

	trigger_switch = {
		on_trigger = religion
		
		# Christian
		catholic = { remove_province_modifier = secret_catholic_community }

		miao_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_miao_pagan_reformed_community }
		minahasan_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_minahasan_pagan_reformed_community }
		minangkabau_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_minangkabau_pagan_reformed_community }
		nivkh_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_nivkh_pagan_reformed_community }
		ryukyuan_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_ryukyuan_pagan_reformed_community }
		sanamahi_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_sanamahi_pagan_reformed_community }
		sundanese_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_sundanese_pagan_reformed_community }
		tai_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_tai_pagan_reformed_community }
		taiwanese_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_taiwanese_pagan_reformed_community }
		viet_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_viet_pagan_reformed_community }
		yi_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_yi_pagan_reformed_community }
		zhuang_pagan_reformed = { remove_province_modifier = secret_zhuang_pagan_reformed_community }
		
		# Mazdan
		zoroastrian = { remove_province_modifier = secret_zoroastrian_community }
		mazdaki = { remove_province_modifier = secret_mazdaki_community }
		manichaean = { remove_province_modifier = secret_manichaean_community }
		khurmazta = { remove_province_modifier = secret_khurmazta_community }
	}
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_1_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
					is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
				
				save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						trigger = {
							NOT = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
							
							any_province_holding = {
								OR = {
									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							owner = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							event_target:pulse_province = {
								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}
							}
						}
						
						set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
						
						# Stop and attempt to spread
					}
					
					50 = {
						# Maybe continue
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		100 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
					is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_1_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_2_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
					is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
				
				save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						trigger = {
							NOT = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
							
							any_province_holding = {
								OR = {
									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							owner = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							event_target:pulse_province = {
								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}
							}
						}
						
						set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
						
						# Stop and attempt to spread
					}
					
					50 = {
						# Maybe continue
					}
				}
			}
		}

			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road

					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province

					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes

						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes

					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}

							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province

					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road

							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}

						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes

					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province

							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_2_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_3_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
					is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
				
				save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						trigger = {
							NOT = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
							
							any_province_holding = {
								OR = {
									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							owner = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							event_target:pulse_province = {
								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}
							}
						}
						
						set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
						
						# Stop and attempt to spread
					}
					
					50 = {
						# Maybe continue
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		100 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
					is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_3_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}

			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road

						is_silk_road_path_4_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province

				}
			}
		}
	}
