						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_122_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_122_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_122_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_122_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_122_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_122_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_122_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes

					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}

									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}

							factor = 2

							factor = 2

						}

							factor = 2

								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2

								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}

				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
					is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_123_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_124_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
					is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
				
				save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						trigger = {
							NOT = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
							
							any_province_holding = {
								OR = {
									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							owner = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							event_target:pulse_province = {
								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}
							}
						}
						
						set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
						
						# Stop and attempt to spread
					}
					
					50 = {
						# Maybe continue
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		100 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
					is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_124_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_125_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes

					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
				
				save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						trigger = {
							NOT = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
							
							any_province_holding = {
								OR = {
									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}

							factor = 2
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							owner = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							event_target:pulse_province = {
								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}
							}
						}
						
						set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
						
						# Stop and attempt to spread
					}
					
					50 = {
						# Maybe continue
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		100 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
					is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_125_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_126_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
					is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
				
				save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						trigger = {
							NOT = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
							
							any_province_holding = {
								OR = {
									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							owner = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							event_target:pulse_province = {
								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}
							}
						}
						
						set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
						
						# Stop and attempt to spread
					}
					
					50 = {
						# Maybe continue
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		100 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
					is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_126_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes

					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province

									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city

							}

						}

							factor = 2

									value >= 5
								}
							}

					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes

					NOR = {

							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes

						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_127_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_128_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
					is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
				
				save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						trigger = {
							NOT = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
							
							any_province_holding = {
								OR = {
									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							owner = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							event_target:pulse_province = {
								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}
							}
						}
						
						set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
						
						# Stop and attempt to spread
					}
					
					50 = {
						# Maybe continue
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		100 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
					is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_128_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_sea
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_129_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes

						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province

						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_129_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

determine_new_silk_road_path_130_province_effect = {
	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Go to next node and maybe continue
			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
					is_silk_road_node_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
				
				save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
				
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						trigger = {
							NOT = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
							
							any_province_holding = {
								OR = {
									holding_type = castle
									holding_type = city
								}
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							owner = {
								religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							}
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 1.2
							silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						}
						
						mult_modifier = {
							factor = 2
							event_target:pulse_province = {
								check_variable = {
									which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
									value >= 5
								}
							}
						}
						
						set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
						
						# Stop and attempt to spread
					}
					
					50 = {
						# Maybe continue
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		100 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
					is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Holy site along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						is_holy_site_of_spreading_religion_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
					
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Trade post along current path
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_trade_post_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		50 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
					owner = {
						religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					}
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province owned by ruler with the same religion
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						owner = {
							religion = event_target:starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						}
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		25 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching public community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_public_silk_road_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
					silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Province with matching secret community
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						silk_road_has_matching_secret_religious_community_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
		
		10 = {
			trigger = {
				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
					NOR = {
						province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
						has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
					}
				}
			}
			
			# Random province
			
			random_independent_ruler = {
				limit = {
					any_realm_province = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				}
				
				random_realm_province = {
					limit = {
						trade_route = silk_road
						is_silk_road_path_130_province_trigger = yes
						NOR = {
							province = event_target:current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
							has_province_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_path
						}
					}
				
					save_event_target_as = current_silk_road_religion_spread_province
					
					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	set_global_flag = silk_road_religion_spread_land
}

	random_list = {
		250 = {
			mult_modifier = {
				factor = 2
				event_target:pulse_province = {
					check_variable = {
						which = silk_road_religion_spread_distance
						value < 5
					}
				}
			}

			any_trade_route_province = {
				limit = {
					trade_route = silk_road
					is_silk_road_path_131_province_trigger = yes

									holding_type = city

			}
		}

					set_global_flag = final_silk_road_religion_spread_target_set

			}
		}

				any_trade_route_province = {
					trade_route = silk_road
